org.hibernate.cache
Interface CacheProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractJndiBoundCacheProvider, EhCacheProvider, HashtableCacheProvider, NoCacheProvider, OSCacheProvider, SwarmCacheProvider, TreeCacheProvider
public interface CacheProvider

Support for pluggable caches.

Author:
Gavin King
